attributes.action: Effectively manage the wild boar population
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wild boar that have been re-introduced into our UK woods are increasingly becoming more confrontational with both people and their animals. Something needs to be done about them now as they are no longer controlled as they would have been, hundreds of years ago by natural predators (ie Wolves). They damage road side verges by digging them up and they breed prolifically.
